description: PM Modi attends the inauguration of the World Culture Festival India is so diverse and it has so much to contribute to the world: PM I congratulate Sri Sri Ravi Shankar for spreading his message to various countries and representing Indian culture on a world stage: PM This is a Kumbh Mela of culture…
caption: nm-4.com
message:
#WorldCultureFestival is a Kumbh Mela of culture…a great confluence of people from all over the world. Glad to be a part of the festival. I congratulate Sri Sri Ravi Shankar ji & The Art of Living family for their stupendous efforts, which bring the world closer. 

My speech at the World Culture Festival on India's cultural prowess & what the 'Art of Living' is. http://nm-4.com/exwi
